casebody.data:
655 A.2d 980 AMERICAN STATES INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. George B. WINELAND, III, and Virginia Wineland, his wife, individually and as Parents and Natural Guardians of Seth Wineland, a Minor. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Argued March 8, 1995. Decided March 28, 1995. Timothy J. Burdette, Stephen J. Poljak, Anstandig, Levicoff & McDyer, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant. Richard Serbin, Joseph J. Nypaver, Levine, Reese & Ser-bin, Altoona, for appellees.

Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM:

Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
